actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-999.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the joint resolution (H.J.Res. 738) making continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 1987, and for other purposes, and against the consideration of such conference report.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the conference report on H.J. Res. 738 (continuing appropriations) and against its consideration.

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the joint resolution (H.J.Res. 738) making continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 1987, and for other purposes, and against the consideration of such conference report.
